tool_description: Manages escrow accounts for marketplace transactions, holding funds until specified release conditions are met and handling fund releases or returns.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the escrowed transaction

escrow_amount.description: Amount to be held in escrow

release_conditions.description: Array of conditions that must be met to release funds

release_to_recipient_id.description: Identifier of the recipient when funds are released

escrow_duration_hours.description: Maximum hours to hold funds in escrow

auto_release.description: Whether to automatically release funds when conditions are met

dispute_protection.description: Whether dispute protection is enabled for this escrow

error_messages: Invalid escrow amount: Amount must be greater than 0.
Empty release conditions: At least one release condition must be specified.
Invalid escrow duration: Duration must be between 1 and 720 hours (30 days).
Transaction already escrowed: This transaction is already under escrow management.
Insufficient funds: Not enough funds available to place in escrow.
Invalid recipient: The specified release recipient is not valid.
usage: Provide transaction_id, escrow_amount, release_conditions, and release_to_recipient_id. Configure escrow_duration_hours, auto_release, and dispute_protection as needed. The tool manages the escrow lifecycle.

escrow_account_id.description: Unique identifier for the escrow account

escrow_status.description: Current status of the escrow account

release_deadline.description: Date and time when escrow will automatically release

conditions_met.description: Array of release conditions that have been satisfied

pending_conditions.description: Array of release conditions still pending
